string.name: filter
string.info: Input field hint text for filtering results.

string.name: path
string.info: Path, directory, file.

string.name: method
string.info: Program method or function.

string.name: stack_trace
string.info: Function call stack information.

resources.string: The file content cannot be displayed.
The application was launched with an unsupported M-Files URL or link.

string.name: unsupported_files
string.info: Error message shown when unsupported files are opened.

resources.string: The file(s) cannot be opened in M-Files.
No content received from the selected content provider, or processing the content failed.
The M-Files link is missing the object GUID needed for identifying an object in a replica vault.
The M-Files link is missing the file GUID needed for identifying a file in a replica vault.

The M-Files link points to an object or its file in a replica vault. In this case, objects and files can be identified only using GUIDs, but the current replica vault server does not support object and file GUIDs. GUID support requires, at minimum, server version %s.
Unable to connect to the vault. Would you like to view your downloaded files?

string.name: file_does_not_exist
string.info: Error message for files that does not exist.

resources.string: The link refers to an object type that does not exist.
The current server version does not support creating objects in offline mode.
The data type of the property in the link does not match the one specified on the server.
The link refers to a property with an unsupported data type.
The link contains an invalid value for the property \"%s\".

string.name: workflow_error_no_state_not_reachable
string.info: Error message used when the workflow cannot be changed, caused by a change of class, because the 'no state' state cannot be reached.

resources.string: Changing the class causes the workflow to be changed.\n\nYou have to make a state transition to \"no state\" before the workflow can be changed.

string.name: workflow_error_online_needed
string.info: Error message used when the workflow cannot be changed, caused by a change of class, because there is no internet available.

resources.string: You need to be online to make this class change. Please try again.

string.name: workflow_error_first_state_not_reachable
string.info: Error message used when the workflow cannot be changed, caused by a change of class, because the first state cannot be reached.

resources.string: Changing the class causes the workflow to be changed, but the first state of the new workflow could not be found.

string.name: pinned_error_item_missing
string.info: Error message used when the pinned item is not available.

resources.string: The pinned item cannot be found.

string.name: search_offline_error
string.info: Error message to user when user try to search offline

resources.string: You need to be online to make a search.

string.name: unable_to_open_link_in_offline
string.info: When user tries to open object/view link inb offline show error with this message.

resources.string: You need to be online to be able to open M-Files links. Please try again when a connection is available.

string.name: license_does_not_allow_creating_objects
string.info: Inform user when he tries creating objects without necessary permission.

resources.string: Your license does not allow creating new objects.

string.name: confirm_open_object
string.info: Confirmation message before opening an object from QR code scanned.

resources.string: The scanned code will open an object. Do you want to continue?

string.name: confirm_new_object_creation
string.info: Confirmation message before opening a new object from QR code scanned.

resources.string: The scanned code will create a new object. Do you want to continue?

string.name: confirm_open_view
string.info: Confirmation message before opening a view from QR code scanned.

resources.string: The scanned code will open a view. Do you want continue?

string.name: confirm_open_object_different_vault
string.info: Confirmation message before opening an object of different vault from QR code scanned.

resources.string: The scanned code will open an object in another vault. Do you want to continue?

string.name: confirm_new_object_creation_different_vault
string.info: Confirmation message before opening a new object of different vault from QR code scanned.

resources.string: The scanned code will create a new object in another vault. Do you want to continue?

string.name: confirm_open_view_different_vault
string.info: Confirmation message before opening a view of different vault from QR code scanned.

resources.string: The scanned code will open a view in another vault. Do you want to continue?

string.name: scanned_url_is_invalid
string.info: Error message when invalid MF link is opened.

resources.string: The M-Files URL within the scanned code is invalid.

string.name: invalid_url_scanned
string.info: Error message when invalid server url is scanned

resources.string: The URL within the scanned code is invalid.

string.name: invalid_access_of_mflink

resources.string: This operation cannot be performed here.

string.name: scanned_code_search_link_confirmation
string.info: Confirmation message before searching from QR code scanned.

resources.string: The scanned code will perform a search. Do you want to continue?

string.name: scanned_code_search_link_another_vault_confirmation
string.info: Confirmation message before searching in different vault from QR code scanned.

resources.string: The scanned code will perform a search in another vault. Do you want to continue?

string.name: add_connection_to_proceed
string.info: Message shown when trying to access object/view of vault not available

resources.string: Add a connection to this vault to continue.

string.name: license_does_not_allow_this_operation
string.info: Inform user when he tries to perform any operation without neccesary permission

resources.string: Access denied. Your license type does not allow this operation.
Please check your username, password and server address, and confirm you have a valid license on the server.
Your user account is not assigned to any vault.
The preshared key was successfully set.
The preshared key is no longer available for the server you were using.
No server using HTTPS can be found. Would you like M-Files to try HTTP instead?
An SSL error has occurred preventing the HTTPS connection from being established. Would you like M-Files to try HTTP instead?

string.name: forgot_password
string.info: a link name in login view.

resources.string: Are you sure you want to remove the current PIN code? This action logs you out of all the vaults.
The PIN codes do not match. Try again.
An incorrect PIN was entered too many times. Enter your user credentials to continue.
This vault requires a PIN code. This also activates PIN code query for entering the app.
Go to the security settings of your device and add at least one fingerprint.
Your fingerprint could not be recognized. Enter your PIN.
Fingerprint identification could not be used:\n %s
Your PIN code was reset a while ago. If this was not you, we recommend you to change your PIN.

string.name: about_format

string.name: unknown_data
string.info: Text to be used in about_format, if server version is not available and other places if data is unknown

resources.string: M-Files® is a powerful and dynamic enterprise content management (ECM) and document management solution that solves the problems of managing, finding, tracking and securing information in companies of all sizes.
There are no applications that can perform this action. Please install a web browser.

© 2019 M-Files Corporation

PDF technology powered by PDFNet Mobile SDK. Copyright 2001–2019 PDFTron™ Systems Inc. Distributed by M-Files Corporation under license. All rights reserved.

M-Files is a registered trademark of M-Files Corporation.

string.info: Title for file upload progress.

string.name: progress_format_single
string.info: Format for transferring single file. %d is integer, %% is a single percent character.

string.name: progress_format_double
string.info: Format for transferring multiple files. %1$d is integer of total progress, %2$d is progress of a single file, %% is a single percent character.

resources.string: The selected area cannot be cropped. Please make a new selection.
The PDF file could not be created.
Last updated more than a year ago
Some offline objects could not be automatically uploaded.\nUse the \"Go online\" option in the \"Offline\" view options menu.
The object \"%s\" is missing required property values.
You do not have the permissions for creating objects to this vault.

string.name: offline_sync_progress
string.info: Format for sync offline objects. %1$s is object version name, %2$d is index of item being synced, %3$d is total number of offline items to be synced.

resources.string: You do not have the permissions for editing objects in this vault.
Your changes to \"%1$s\" could not be saved to this vault.\nThe server provided the following error: %2$s
Your changes to \"%s\" could not be saved to this vault, because there is a newer version of this object on the server.
The object \"%1$s\" could not be saved to this vault. The server provided the following error: %2$s
It seems that your device is now connected to a network.\nTo go back online, select \"Go online\" via the options menu of either the home view or the \"Offline\" view.

string.name: offline_preferences_category
string.info: Offline storage settings category

resources.string: File size limit for offline files
%1$s will be automatically loaded for objects marked for offline availability.
All files will be automatically loaded for objects marked for offline availability.
Automatic file loading has not been enabled.
A maximum of %1$s recently viewed objects are displayed in the offline view. To also have their files available offline, you need to have opened the files while still online.
Rolling cache has not been enabled.
Objects are automatically updated %1$s for vaults opened in online mode.
Automatic object updating has not been enabled.
Are you sure you want to remove all your offline content from this vault?
Changes made offline are automatically saved to the vault when you are back online.
Objects are checked in automatically during synchronization.
Some of the PIN code settings cannot be changed because you are currently logged in to the following vaults requiring a PIN code: %s
Some of the vaults may also limit the options available for the PIN code validity period.
Ask for the PIN code every time the app is opened. Accessing a vault may also require the PIN code.
Use fingerprint identification instead of a PIN code.

string.name: reset_password_request_sent
string.info: Message shown to user after password reset is successfully requested.

resources.string: The password reset request will be sent to the e-mail address associated with your M-Files login account:\n%s\nIf you do not receive the e-mail message within five minutes, check your "spam" folder or "junk e-mail" folder to make sure that the message has not been filtered out. Contact M-Files support at support@m-files.com for further assistance.

string.name: file_not_accessible_error

resources.string: %d of the shared files were not accessible.

string.name: check_in_alert
string.info: Prompt to confirm file check-in.

resources.string: The object \"%s\" was automatically checked out for editing. Would you like to check it in?

string.name: checkout_alert
string.info: Message shown, when the user tries to open a file without preview and notify user about the checkout operation that will happen.

resources.string: The file is now checked out for editing.

string.name: suggestion_exceeds_length
string.info: Message to alert user that chosen suggestion will exceed the length of the property's value.

resources.string: The suggestion(s) cannot be added to the property value because the value would become too long.

string.name: suggestion_count
string.info: To show number of suggestions in show all dialog

string.name: value_list_item_do_not_exist
string.info: Message to alert user that chosen suggestion is a new value.

resources.string: The value \"%s\" does not exist in the list. Do you want to add it?

string.name: new_value
string.info: Title for add new value list item dialog.

string.name: owner_is_not_unique
string.info: Adding new value list item to a subtype value list will be blocked, if its owner property has multiple values, through this alert message.

resources.string: The new value list item cannot be created because the \"%s\" property refers to more than one owner object.

string.name: check_in_owner_object
string.info: User is not allowed add a new value list item to a property, whose owner value list object type is the same object being created, using this alert message.

resources.string: You must check in the object first before you can add items to this value list.

string.name: owner_property_missing
string.info: Adding new value list item to a subtype value list will be blocked, if its owner property is not found in the metadata, through this alert message.

resources.string: The new item cannot be added to the list, because the owner object of the value list cannot be found in the object metadata.

string.name: owner_has_no_value
string.info: Adding new value list item to a subtype value list will be blocked, if its owner property do not have a value, through this alert message.

resources.string: The new item cannot be added to the list, because the owner object of the value list (%s) has no value.

string.name: duplicate_value_list
string.info: Alert message shown, when user tries to add duplicate value list item.

resources.string: The value \"%s\" already exists in the list. Are you sure you want to add it?

string.name: add_a_new_value
string.info: The UI add new value control text

string.name: copy_to_clipboard
string.info: Name of the option when sharing a link to be copied into the clipboard.

string.name: successful_copy_to_clipboard
string.info: Message shown to the user to give feedback about successfully copying content to the clipboard.

string.name: search_results_from_single_repository
string.info: Information on the number of results available when one repository is selected.

string.name: search_results_from_multiple_repositories
string.info: Information on the number of results available when multiple repositories are selected.

string.name: low_storage_alert
string.info: Message shown when user's device storage is low.

resources.string: It looks like the internal storage space of your device is running low and this may slow down the application.\n\nTry to remove any unnecessary data.

string.name: scan_bar_code
string.info: Text shown in the shortcuts of the application icon launcher.

string.info: Search shortcut title.

string.name: create_object
string.info: Create new object shortcut title.

item.info: Option to save the file as new object.
Option to save the file to existing object.
